house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1991 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/2 half bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 4953 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room. Features include view, private pool, fireplace, air conditioning, french doors.
house_listing.firm_name: Esslinger-Wooten-M Esslinger-Wooten-M Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, French Doors, Kitchen Island, OutdoorLights, Pantry
